section.37: Chapters on the description of the Day of Judgement, Ar-Riqaq, and Al-Wara'

hadiths.text: Abu Sa'eed narrated the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said:"Indeed in my Ummah are those who intercede for large groups of people, and among them (there are) who intercede for a tribe, and among them (there are) who intercede for a group, and among them (there are) who intercede for a man, until they are admitted to Paradise
